title.rendered: Disposable 3-layer mask pads replacement for Anti-flu/Dust Face mask,150/Pk

content.rendered:
General Information

 

  • Material is made of spunlaced viscose Premium Non-woven which Very ultra-soft skin-friendly breathable fabric; it also offers multi-effect isolation for more protection.
  • Each disposable Face Mask Filter Gasket/ Bag. Effectively filters PM2.5 haze, dust, prevents secondhand smoke and other fine particles.
  • Universal – Suitable for various types of masks, including N95 masks, disposable masks and dust masks.
  • Disposable – It is recommended to replace it every 2-3 hours: safer and more able to protect your health.
  • Affordable – Only the inner cushion needs to be replaced, no need to change your expensive masks frequently, save your money.

Specifications

  • Colour: White
  • Material: Non-woven
  • Size: 12.5 x 9cm/4.9 x 3.54in
  • Uses: block dust, smoke, pollen, dust, antibacterial, etc.

excerpt.rendered:
Product Description

The Disposable 3-layer Mask Pad Replacement for anti-flu dust face masks are gaskets that are placed inside the mask to increase the number of times the mask can be used. It only needs changing to the inner cushion instead of the mask. It is to be used in case of a shortage of masks where the masking gasket is the best choice.  You can put the mask replacement pad inside the mask, it can maintain the hygiene inside the mask, the masking gasket effectively blocks the direct contact between the face and the mask, and it will not contaminate the inside of the mask with your own saliva.

These masks are Disposable and made of three layers of non-woven fabric, they are soft and breathable with three layers of mask cushions providing effective protection. They are hypoallergenic and non-toxic. It is suitable for sensitive skin with zero chemical smell, and it perfectly fits the face to make you feel comfortable and safe.
